article.title: Information Security Innovation Recognized
article.abstract: (ISC)², the not-for-profit information security professional body that administers the Certified Information Systems Security Professional certification, announced this week the winners of its eighth annual U.S. Government Information Security Leadership Awards.
article.text: (ISC)², the not-for-profit information security professional body that administers the Certified Information Systems Security Professional certification, announced this week the winners of its eighth annual U.S. Government Information Security Leadership Awards. Among the winners are a cyber dashboard that foiled a number of attacks against U.S. Defense Department email accounts, a cyber training program for U.S. Air Force Space Command, and a Department of Homeland Security effort to develop a central coordination point for strategic security awareness.
